TypeDefinition.gml:description: In order to link a pair of nodes within the graph structure of a NetworkFeature, a special type of edge called InteriorFeatureLink is introduced which is only allowed to relate two nodes belonging to the same FeatureGraph instance. Modeling a single InteriorFeatureLink is not allowed because an edge has always to be bounded by exactly two nodes.
TypeDefinition.gml:name: utilcore:InteriorFeatureLink
